tool_description: We provide articles and news related to various brands. Users can search for their desired brand name in the query.

api_list.name: search results
api_list.description: This API allows users to retrieve articles and news related to a specific brand by searching with the brand name.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The brand name to search for.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The country code for the search results.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The language for the search results.
